Make 'parseSeperator' EVEN MOAR specific

Prevents conflict with table syntax AND alternate header syntax.
This matches exactly 3 dashes on their own line.
Use 4 or more dashes for Horizontal lines ;)

Make 'parseSeparator' more specific

Fixes the conflict with markdown table syntax, where dashes used in
tables (for headers) would be converted to commas.

Merge pull request #52 from nimag42/master

Corrected a bug in date parser

Corrected a bug in date parser

The regexp used for parsing date (dateParser) had a type : it missed a backslash for parsing numbers (\d).
Now it correctly parses 'yyyy-mm-dd' formatted date.
Fixed regex bug and switched rendering dates to UTC to avoid mismatch of filename to date object
